name: Box Fight Tournament
description:
How do you know which box is the right one to store your things?

There are so many sizes and different materials that it makes it even more difficult to choose, so why don't we put them to the fight and find out which box is the most suitable?

This is how the wildest tournament is born where you will see all kinds of boxes fight in a wrestling ring using their special skills.

Not allowed for cardiacs.

IMPORTANT

This is an alpha in its version 0.1.0, we need your help, within the game there will be a section to direct you to a form, your feedback will help us a lot.

It is a multiplayer game for two people, it is necessary to connect a gamepad, it can be a dualshock 4, 360 gamepad or xbox one gamepad. To play with gamepad and keyboard or play with two gamepads.
